job_title: Java Developer with strong web crawling
jd: Hi Please share the resume on sushil.k@mobcoderstaffing.comPosition : Java Developer with strong web crawling Location : Sunnyvale CAJob type : contract Note: Local to Bay Area JD:Java and Web CrawlingStandard SQL knowledgeExperienced in delivering advanced solutions for a multi-tier, distributed web applicationExperienced in crafting and implementing REST API Proven strong problem solving and debugging skillsExperienced in developing applications that utilize relational databases (e.g. Oracle) and other less structured data stores (NoSQL)Ability to articulate the benefits of Test Driven Development, Continuous Integration.Knowledge of data modeling es using Oracle and Cassandra databases.Equally valuable is experience in building low latency service APIs, and data aggregation pipelines.AWS experience Must have Java Spring Oracle REST API JPA, Hibernate Skills: web crawling, java, Microservices, Spring boot, AWS Thanks and RegardsSushil Kaushik Mobcoder IT Solutions LLC
